-The main page dispalaying the readings of temperature and humidity also shows the status of different devices or machineries interfaced with the system.
 -It also shows the water level at the top and the controlling buttons settled below.

 *How to activate the buttons?
 -Once the device you prefer to control gets connected to the relay switch, the buttons will function properly and it will show you the activated/deactivated status on the screen.

 *Can we use bluetooth for using the App?
 -The application is designed to contol and monitor via internet connection. So, we cannot use bluetooth.

 *What is the range of its control over any Device/machine ?
 -We can operate and control the device/machine from any part of the world having a good internet connection.

 Note : The software is only applicable and functioning after establishing a proper setup of hardware. Proper connection of each and every device/machine with the relay board.
